TRANSFER INSTRUCTION REQUEST
Good day{!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Thank you for your email.
Please note that in order for us to process the transfer request, the instruction needs to comply with the following:
· The request must be on a letterhead.
· The number of the debit account must be provided.
· The beneficiary name and account number must be provided.
· The amount must be provided in alpha and numeric characters (word and numbers).
· If a reference is relevant, it must be clearly stated as such.
· The value date must be stated.
· The names and surnames of the signatories must be provided next to the signatures.
· The request must be signed according to the signing instructions of Absa Bank Limited.
· The request must be emailed to corporatejhb@absa.co.za.
· The request must be sent by a mandated signatory or a mandated official according to the relevant Financial Indemnity of Absa Bank.
